text: Salvatore Caruso was the defending champion but lost in the second round to Jan Choinski. Facundo Mena won the title after defeating Andrej Martin 2–6, 6–4, 6–1 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Città di Como Challenger - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Città di Como Challenger – Singles
